select.sql: select u.Login, concat(u.FirstName,' ',u.LastName) as Author,n.* from ut_news n left outer join ut_users u on u.UserID=n.UserID where n.Lang='$lang;' and '$id;'='' or NewsID='$id;' order by n.Date desc

comments.sql: select c.*,u.Login,u.Approved,u.FirstName,u.LastName from ut_news_comments c left outer join ut_users u on u.UserID=c.UserID where c.NewsID='$id;' order by c.Date desc
